pages.rugs: RugBazaar - Finest Indian Rugs | Handmade Carpets | Contemporary Designs | About our rugs Home About our rugs Contact us Call us Choosing the Perfect Rug Understanding Your Needs Choosing the perfect rug for your home is an important decision. Before you start shopping, take some time to consider your needs. Think about the size of the room, the existing décor, and the amount of foot traffic the area receives. This will help you narrow down your options and find a rug that meets your specific requirements. Consider the function of the room when selecting a rug. For high-traffic areas like the living room or hallway, you'll want a durable rug that can withstand heavy use. In bedrooms and dining rooms, you may want a softer, more plush rug for added comfort. Once you have an idea of what you're looking for, consider the style of rug that best suits your home décor. Do you prefer traditional, oriental-style rugs with intricate patterns and rich colors? Or do you lean towards more modern, minimalist designs with clean lines and neutral tones? Take into account the color scheme of your room when choosing a rug. A rug should complement the existing colors and patterns in the room without overwhelming the space. If you have a bold, colorful room, you may want to choose a rug with a more subtle design. Alternatively, if your room is more neutral, you can use a rug to add a pop of color and interest. Finally, don't forget about the size of the rug. A rug that is too small will look out of place and won't properly anchor the room. As a general rule, aim to leave at least 18 inches of bare floor around the edges of the rug. In a large room, you may even want to consider using multiple rugs to define different areas. Where to Shop Once you have an idea of what you're looking for, it's time to start shopping. There are many places where you can buy rugs, both online and in-store. Online retailers offer a wide selection and often have lower prices, but you won't be able to see or touch the rug before you buy it. In-store retailers, on the other hand, allow you to see the rug in person and often offer more personalized service. When shopping for a rug, be sure to read reviews and do your research to ensure that you're getting a quality product. Look for retailers that offer a wide selection, competitive prices, and good customer service. At RugBazaar, we take pride in offering you the finest collection of Indian rugs, each handcrafted with traditional expertise and contemporary designs. Our rugs are made from the highest quality materials and are designed to add warmth, beauty, and elegance to any space. With our easy ordering process, secure payment options, and fast, reliable shipping, you can shop with confidence at RugBazaar. And if you ever have any questions or concerns, our friendly customer service team is always here to help. The Art of Rug Making Traditional Craftsmanship Indian rugs are renowned for their exceptional quality and craftsmanship. Each rug is handcrafted by skilled artisans using traditional techniques that have been passed down through generations. From hand-knotting to hand-tufting, these time-honored methods ensure that each rug is a unique work of art. One of the oldest and most traditional methods of rug making is hand-knotting. In this technique, individual knots are tied onto the warp threads of the rug, creating the pile. Hand-knotted rugs are known for their durability and longevity, as well as their intricate designs and rich colors. Another popular method of rug making is hand-tufting. In this technique, a design is drawn onto a canvas backing, and the yarn is punched through using a tufting gun. The pile is then sheared to create a smooth, even surface. Hand-tufted rugs are often more affordable than hand-knotted rugs, but they can still be of excellent quality. At RugBazaar, we are committed to preserving the traditional art of rug making while also embracing modern design trends. Each rug in our collection is handcrafted using the finest materials and the highest quality craftsmanship. Whether you choose a traditional wool rug or a more contemporary silk design, you can trust that your RugBazaar rug is made to the highest standards of quality and beauty. Quality Materials At RugBazaar, we use only the finest materials to create our rugs. From luxurious wool to sumptuous silk, we source the highest quality materials to ensure that our rugs are not only beautiful but also durable and long-lasting. Wool is a popular choice for rugs because of its natural durability and resilience. It is also naturally stain-resistant and easy to clean, making it an excellent choice for high-traffic areas. In addition to wool, we also offer a range of other materials, including silk, cotton, and jute. Silk rugs are known for their luxurious feel and lustrous sheen, while cotton and jute rugs are more affordable and easy to clean. Whatever your preference, you can trust that your RugBazaar rug is made from the highest quality materials and designed to last for years to come. Why Choose RugBazaar? Exceptional Quality When you choose a rug from RugBazaar, you can trust that you are getting the highest quality product. Each rug in our collection is handcrafted with care and attention to detail, ensuring that it meets our rigorous standards of quality and craftsmanship. Our artisans take pride in their work, and it shows in every rug we produce. Our commitment to quality extends beyond just the materials and craftsmanship of our rugs. We also take great care in the design and selection of our rugs, ensuring that each one is not only beautiful but also functional and durable. Whether you choose a traditional design or a more contemporary style, you can trust that your RugBazaar rug will be a beautiful and lasting addition to your home. Unique Designs One of the things that sets RugBazaar apart from other rug retailers is our unique and diverse collection of designs. From traditional oriental patterns to bold, modern motifs, we offer a wide range of styles to suit every taste and décor. Our designers are constantly exploring new trends and techniques to ensure that our collection is always fresh and exciting. In addition to our wide range of designs, we also offer a range of sizes, shapes, and colors to choose from. Whether you're looking for a large area rug to anchor your living room or a small accent rug to add a pop of color to your entryway, you're sure to find the perfect rug at RugBazaar. Excellent Customer Service At RugBazaar, we are committed to providing our customers with an exceptional shopping experience. From our easy ordering process to our fast, reliable shipping, we go above and beyond to ensure that our customers are satisfied with their purchase. And if you ever have any questions or concerns, our friendly customer service team is always here to help. We understand that buying a rug is an investment, and we want to make sure that you're happy with your purchase. That's why we offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee on all of our rugs. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, simply return it to us within 30 days for a full refund. pages.privacy: RugBazaar - Finest Indian Rugs | Handmade Carpets | Contemporary Designs | privacy policy Home About our rugs Contact us Call us Privacy policy Your privacy is important to us. It is RugBazaar's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website and other sites we own and operate. Information we collect Log data When you visit our website, our servers may automatically log the standard data provided by your web browser. It may include your computer's Internet Protocol (IP) address, your browser type and version, the pages you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on each page, and other details. Device data We may also collect data about the device you're using to access our website. This data may include the device type, operating system, unique device identifiers, device settings, and geo-location data. What we collect can depend on the individual settings of your device and software. We recommend checking the policies of your device manufacturer or software provider to learn what information they make available to us. Personal information We may ask for personal information, such as your: Name Email Phone/mobile number Home/Mailing address Payment information We may also use your personal information to contact you with marketing and promotional materials and other information that may be of interest to you. You may opt out of receiving any, or all, of these communications from us by following the unsubscribe link or by emailing at the contact details provided below. International transfers of personal information The personal information we collect is stored and/or processed where we or our partners, affiliates, and third-party providers maintain facilities. Please be aware that the locations to which we store, process, or transfer your personal information may not have the same data protection laws as the country in which you initially provided the information. If we transfer your personal information to third parties in other countries: (i) we will perform those transfers in accordance with the requirements of applicable law; and (ii) we will protect the transferred personal information in accordance with this privacy policy. This website may include hyperlinks to, and details of, third-party websites. We have no control over, and are not responsible for, the privacy policies and practices of third parties. Amendments We may update this policy from time to time by publishing a new version on our website. You should check this page occasionally to ensure you understand any changes to this policy. We may notify you of changes to this policy by email or through the private messaging system on our website. Your acceptance of these terms By using our website, you signify your acceptance of our privacy policy. If you do not agree to this policy, please do not use our website. Your continued use of the website following the posting of changes to this policy will be deemed your acceptance of those changes. How to contact us If you have any questions about our privacy policy, the data we hold on you, or you would like to exercise one of your data protection rights, please do not hesitate to contact us.
